vote.title: To honor, recognize, and celebrate the life of Robert Andrew Peacock and to extend our sincerest condolences to his family and friends.
vote.description:
Title
 
To honor, recognize, and celebrate the life of Robert Andrew Peacock and to extend our sincerest condolences to his family and friends. 
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Robert was born on January 24th, 1973 and passed away on April 30th, 2025 at the age of 52; and 
 
WHEREAS, Robert was known for his lovely singing voice, his commitment to his community, and his dedication to his family; and 
 
WHEREAS, Robert graduated from the Columbus State Community College and DeVry Institute, which led to his notable career in Information Technology at Make-A-Wish Foundation for many years; and 
 
WHEREAS, Robert was a proud member of his church where he and his wife sang in the praise and worship band together, a testament to his community spirit, which brought joy to many; and 
 
WHEREAS, family and friends came first for Robert. He was a beloved husband, father, and son who left his family with cherished memories of their time together; now therefore, 
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: 
That we do hereby share our deepest condolences with the Peacock family and honor, recognize, and celebrate the life of Robert Andrew Peacock.
